title: Forestry mounder to aid tree planting
summary: A forestry mounder able produce a discontinuous mounding with no more than 1m of bare soil before a break of 1m

eligible.eligibleBullet02: be able to fell and de-limb
eligible.eligibleBullet03: produce a discontinuous mounding with no more than 1m of bare soil before a break of 1m to reduce risk of run off
eligible.eligibleBullet04: create a bare area on the mound to allow direct planting into bare ground
eligible.eligibleBullet05: fully invert the soil to bury surface vegetation
eligible.eligibleText01: Forestry mulchers are not eligible under this item.
